meka.gui.core

Class GUIHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • meka.gui.core.GUIHelper

  • public class GUIHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A little helper class for GUI related stuff.
    Version:
    $Revision: 66 $
    Author:
    fracpete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
